title.rendered: VIRDI AC-5000 PLUS IP65 FINGERPRINT/CARD TERMINAL

content.rendered:
VIRDI AC-5000 PLUS is an evolution in fingerprint terminal technology, incorporating state of the art design, elegant looks and a robust IP65 rated housing.

Features

  • Log Capacity : 64,000
  • Max Users : 20,000
  • LCD : 2.8” Color LCD
  • CPU : ARM, 533MHz CPU
  • Communication : TCP/IP, Wiegand In/Out, RS485, USB
  • RFID Card Option : 13.56MHz Smart Card
  • Memory : 128MB RAM + 32MB FLASH Memory
  • Power Consumption : 12V, Max 350mA (4.2W)
